data.oai_dc:dc: SQLITE database of LASTZ matches between assembled contigs in birds-contigs-assembled-from-uce-loci.fasta.gz and the UCE probes. This database is used to construct data sets containing loci that are shared across taxa and prep data for alignment. These data are derived from birds-lastz-matches-of-probes-to-contigs.lastz.tar.gz.
